mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT_EQUIP_REG (ATTACHMENT_EQUIP_REG_ID, EQUIP_CODE, ATTACHMENT_NAME, ATTACHMENT_PATH, ATTACHMENT_SIZE, ATTACHMENT_ORDER, CREATED_DATE) VALUES (ATTACHMENT_EQUIP_REG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{equipCode}, #{attachmentName}, #{attachmentPath}, #{attachmentSize}, #{attachmentOrder}, SYSDATE)
